Cycling groups have welcomed proposals to introduce road pricing in London as part of a drive to reduce carbon emissions and improve air quality in the capital.
Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, said… [+5079 chars]

articles.title: FCA to strengthen financial promotions rules to protect consumers | FCA - FCA
articles.description: The FCA is acting to address concerns about the ease and speed with which people can make high-risk investments by proposing a significant strengthening of its rules on how high-risk financial products are marketed.  This is a central element of the FCA's Con…
articles.content: Under the proposed rules, the FCA would ensure firms that approve and communicate financial marketing have relevant expertise and understanding of the investments being offered, improve risk warnings… [+2894 chars]
